original_text: The cherubim are to have their wings spread upward, overshadowing the cover with them. The cherubim are to face each other, looking toward the cover.
korean_text: 그룹들은 그 날개를 높이 펴서 그 날개로 속죄소를 덮으며 그 얼굴을 서로 대하여 속죄소를 향하게 하고

sentences.original_text: The cherubim are to have their wings spread upward,
sentences.korean_translation: 그룹들은 그들의 날개를 위로 펼쳐야 하며,

sentences.original_text: The cherubim are to face each other,
